citation.article-title: Reichenbachia agariperforans gen. nov., sp. nov., a novel marine bacterium in the phylum Cytophaga-Flavobacterium-Bacteroides
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Reichenbachia (Rei.chen.bach′i.a. N.L. fem. n. Reichenbachia after Hans Reichenbach, a German microbiologist, who has made a great contribution to the taxonomy of bacteria belonging to the phylum CFB).
Does not form endospores or resting stages.
The main cellular fatty acids are straight-chain unsaturated and branched-chain saturated fatty acids, Ci15 : 0 and C16 : 1(n-7).
As determined by 16S rDNA sequence analysis, the genus Reichenbachia is a member of the phylum CFB.
The type species is Reichenbachia agariperforans.
